page.title: 05THE WHEATSHEAF INN,WOODFORD
page.content: Mr Charlton is the licensee at the Wheatsheaf. He has worked there for seven years.The Wheatsheaf is a public house, one cannot spend the night there, but one can have a drink or a meal. People have been attracted to Woodford because it is beautiful, and Amesbury and Salisbury tourist boards are sending all the tourists to this area. At the Wheatsheaf there are three kitchen staff and two bar people. There is also Mr Charlton and his wife Jennifer helping. The Wheatsheaf opens at 10.00 to 2.30 p.m. and from 6.00 to 11.00 in summer, and in winter the same in the morning,but from 6.00 to 10.30 p.m. in the evening . Nowadays children under eighteen years of age are not allowed into public houses.
